title: How to prevent yourself from getting overexcited from winning?
body:
Hi guys,

In regards to the LoL games, I sometimes get overexcited after winning some games.
And then I play like derp. As stupid as it sounds, it does happen.

Do you have any idea on how to prevent yourself from getting overexcited?
Or the other way around if losing (to prevent yourself from getting desperate to win) ?

Since I think this issue can be related to real life as well, I am looking forward to any positive solution for this.

Please advise
Thank you
